rows.label: qst202305_msg001
rows.name:
Prince...[ML:Dash ] Did you just
say "king of beasts"?

rows.label: qst202305_msg002
rows.name: Huh? Who are you?

rows.label: qst202305_msg003
rows.name:
My apologies. My name is
Zaman. I am a traveling bard.

rows.label: qst202305_msg004
rows.name:
As it happens, there is a
poem I know about the sealing
of the king of beasts...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202305_msg005
rows.name:
Your great shout, Prince,
reminded me of it.

rows.label: qst202305_msg006
rows.name: You know about it?!

rows.label: qst202305_msg007
rows.name: What kind of poem is it?! Tell me!

rows.label: qst202305_msg008
rows.name:
Well, it's a story about heroes
sealing away the suddenly-appeared
king of beasts...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202305_msg009
rows.name:
A hero, along with their Blade and
many allies, set out on a journey
to defeat this king of beasts...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202305_msg010
rows.name:
This beast possessed a
wicked power strong enough
to destroy nations...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202305_msg011
rows.name:
The people called this king of
beasts "Thanatobeast Andraz."

rows.label: qst202305_msg012
rows.name:
Ooh! That's a properly
strong-sounding name!

rows.label: qst202305_msg013
rows.name:
However, even with all their
power, the heroes could not
defeat the king of beasts...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202305_msg014
rows.name:
The hero and their allies sealed
the king of beasts away in
exchange for their own lives.

rows.label: qst202305_msg015
rows.name:
The poem says they sealed
it with four sealstones...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202305_msg016
rows.name:
To ensure the monster would never
be awakened again, they hid the
sealstones in separate lands.

rows.label: qst202305_msg017
rows.name: I see! So, where are these sealstones?!

rows.label: qst202305_msg018
rows.name: If I recall, the poem says...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202305_msg019
rows.name:
The stone of earth in a deep,
green forest... The stone of fire
in a hot, barren wasteland...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202305_msg020
rows.name:
The stone of water in a watery land of
eternal spring... The stone of wind in
a small land blessed by sea breezes...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202305_msg021
rows.name: So sings the poem...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202305_msg022
rows.name:
All right! Then let's go find
those sealstones right away!

rows.label: qst202305_msg023
rows.name:
Eh? [ML:Dash ]Um, what will you
do when you find them?

rows.label: qst202305_msg024
rows.name: Isn't it obvious?

rows.label: qst202305_msg025
rows.name:
I'm going to destroy those sealstones
and revive Thanatobeast Andraz!

rows.label: qst202305_msg026
rows.name:
And then I'll defeat
it with my own hands!

rows.label: qst202305_msg027
rows.name: Defeat it? The king of beasts?!

rows.label: qst202305_msg028
rows.name: Ahahahaha! You're a funny one.

rows.label: qst202305_msg029
rows.name:
You're the first person I've met
who actually believes this poem.

rows.label: qst202305_msg030
rows.name:
We have Hikari's testimony,
so I believe it.

rows.label: qst202305_msg031
rows.name:
By the way, where is this
all-important Thanatobeast
Andraz sealed, anyway?

rows.label: qst202305_msg032
rows.name:
There must be a hint in the
poem for that too, right?

rows.label: qst202305_msg033
rows.name: Ah, about that...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202305_msg034
rows.name: Yes, yes? What is it?

rows.label: qst202305_msg035
rows.name: I've forgotten.

rows.label: qst202305_msg036
rows.name:
Whaat?! How could you forget
such a crucial part?!

rows.label: qst202305_msg037
rows.name:
Well, I never thought a conversation
like this would happen.

rows.label: qst202305_msg038
rows.name:
But don't you worry. I'm sure my
master knows the rest of the poem.

rows.label: qst202305_msg039
rows.name:
I'll ask him while you all are
breaking the four seals...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202305_msg040
rows.name:
Please come to Anastatia's
Inn afterwards.

rows.label: qst202305_msg041
rows.name:
Got it! Then I'm off to find
the sealstones right away!

rows.label: qst202305_msg042
rows.name: Yes, good luck!
